segments.text: I observe the woman, so focused on her mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely neutral, as if nothing unusual is occurring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is practically sloshing around her feet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware she remains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water overflowing from the sink is considerable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wasteful mess, frankly, and quite annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is the drain not working, or why isn't there a plug?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of her standing there, calm amidst the flood, is almost repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels neglectful, even if it's accidental.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she has no clue about the children's secret mission either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of absorption in one small task while chaos reigns is bewildering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and get her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
